snippet: A San Diego man was charged with operating a website that let people anonymously post explicit photographs of others.
abstract: San Diego man Kevin Christopher Bollaert is charged with operating a so-called revenge porn Web site that let people anonymously post explicit photographs of others, and with then extorting the victims.
lead_paragraph: A San Diego man was charged with operating a website that let people anonymously post explicit photographs of others.

headline.main: California: Man Is Charged in ‘Revenge Porn’ Case
headline.print_headline: California: Man Is Charged in ‘Revenge Porn’ Case
